author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Nursing homes must now report all coronavirus cases to patients' families and the CDC
description: Nursing homes are now required to report all novel coronavirus cases directly to the CDC, and families and patients at the facilities must also be informed, CMS Administrator Seema Verma said Sunday.Why it matters: Outside of inpatient health care settings, t…
content:
Nursing homes are now required to report all novel coronavirus cases directly to the CDC, and families and patients at the facilities must also be informed, CMS Administrator Seema Verma said Sunday.
